subSections.title: Readings
Noun
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{top3}}
* {{ja-r|垂直|すいちょく}}: vertical, perpendicular
* {{ja-r|垂線|すいせん}}: perpendicular line
* {{ja-r|懸垂|けんすい}}: suspension, pendency
* {{ja-r|垂れる|たれる}}: hang down
{{mid3}}
* {{ja-r|垂れ下がる|たれさがる}}: hang, dangle
* {{ja-r|雨%垂れ|あま%だれ}}: raindrops
* {{ja-r|垂らす|たらす}}: hang down
* {{ja-r|髪を垂らす|かみをたらす}}: let one's hair hang down
{{mid3}}
* {{ja-r|垂れ|たれ}}: sauce, gravy
* {{ja-r|胡麻垂れ|ごまだれ}}: sesame sauce
* {{ja-r|糞っ垂れ|くそったれ}}: vulgar epithet
* {{ja-r|しみっ垂れ|しみったれ}}: stinginess, miser
{{bottom}}
